overview: A short film that evokes the lived experience of being in the LGBTQ closet via sensual, poetic cinematography.  This film presents the main research findings of a cinematic-phenomenological research study featuring in-depth interviews with research participants about their lived experiences of being closeted as sexual minorities. All imagery in the film is derived from research participantsâ€™ descriptions of what being in the closet felt like for them personally.
tagline: A cinematic poem about being in the closet
title: Illuminate
